description: The Ax Master: Rugged timber man Don Talon stumblesupon two slender 19-year-olds (Jeff Carson and Skip Wilson), whoattempt to start a fire, having sex in a tent. Butch-furry-chested-builtTalon takes control of the situation and fucks them both. Hopefully,teaching them a lesson not to play with fire.
series: Falcon Bareback - Do It For Daddy
title: Falcon Bareback - Do It For Daddy
